resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106006</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106006</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212555</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Fact of Global Warming</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Tatsache des globalen Wärmens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le fait du chauffage global</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O fato de aquecer-se global</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il fatto di riscaldamento globale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το γεγονός της παγκόσμιας αύξησης της θερμοκρασίας 
λόγω του φαινομένου του θερμοκηπίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El hecho de calentarse global</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Slowly, the globe confronts global warming. Quickly, the globe warms. But can we trust computerized climate models? What's happening to the oceans and the ice? Could warming damage your lungs?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Langsam konfrontiert die Kugel das globale 
Wärmen. Schnell wärmt sich die Kugel. Aber können wir 
automatisierten Klimamodellen vertrauen? Was geschieht den 
Ozeanen und dem Eis? Konnte das Wärmen Ihre Lungen 
beschädigen?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lentement, le globe confronte le chauffage global.
Rapidement, le globe chauffe. Mais pouvons-nous faire 
confiance aux modèles automatisés de climat ? Qu'arrive aux 
océans et à la glace ? Le chauffage a-t-il pu endommager vos 
poumons ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lentamente, o globo confronta aquecer-se global. 
Rapidamente, o globo aquece-se. Mas podemos nós confiar 
em modelos computarizados do clima? Que está acontecendo aos 
oceanos e ao gelo? Podia aquecer-se danificar seus pulmões?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lentamente, il globo confronta il riscaldamento 
globale. Rapidamente, il globo scalda. Ma possiamo fidarsi
dei modelli automatizzati di clima? Che cosa sta accadendo agli 
oceani ed al ghiaccio? Ha potuto scaldare danneggiare i vostri 
polmoni?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αργά, η σφαίρα αντιμετωπίζει την παγκόσμια αύξηση της
θερμοκρασίας λόγω του φαινομένου του θερμοκηπίου. Γρήγορα, 
η σφαίρα θερμαίνει. Αλλά μπορούμε να εμπιστευθούμε τα 
αυτοματοποιημένα μοντέλα κλίματος; Ποιο να συμβεί στους 
ωκεανούς και τον πάγο; Θα μπορούσε η θέρμανση να βλάψει 
τους πνεύμονές σας;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lentamente, el globo enfrenta calentarse global. 
Rápidamente, el globo se calienta. ¿Pero podemos confiar 
en modelos automatizados del clima? ¿Qué está sucediendo a los
océanos y al hielo? ¿Podía el calentarse dañar sus pulmones?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:DAVID TENENBAUM
FN:DAVID TENENBAUM
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212555</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106006</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-fact-of-global-warming</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
